title: Zoo with class
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development, production company
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Environmental education
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Victoria. Education Dept. Curriculum Programs
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Zoology - Study and teaching
description: Provides an overview of all aspects of the Melbourne Zoo Education Service. Looks at its philosophy on environmental education, the teaching programmes, curriculum developments and cosultancy. The program also reveals how the zoo education service can become an extension of the classroom and seeks to enable teachers to plan school-based environmental education programs in which the zoo school plays an integral role.
